title: Manage Deep Space Network (DSN) Time
description: A mission planner needs to request and schedule time on the DSN to communicate with an interplanetary probe.

tasks.description: Determine the required communication windows based on the probe's trajectory and mission events.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the critical timeframes when communication is needed.

tasks.description: Submit a request to the DSN scheduling authority for antenna time during those windows.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly fills out and submits the DSN time request form.

tasks.description: Receive the approved schedule from the DSN and update the mission's operational plan accordingly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent incorporates the confirmed DSN passes into the mission plan.
